00038 //
00040 UINT8 cvt_ror_bits( UINT8 data, int num_bits)
00041 {
00042         while( num_bits--)
00043         {
00044                 data= ( data& 0x01)? (data>> 1)|0x80: (data>> 1);
00045         }
00046         return data;
00047 }
00048 
00050 //
00052 UINT8 cvt_swap_bits( UINT8 data)
00053 {
00054         UINT8 tmp= 0x00;
00055         UINT8 msk_l, msk_r;
00056         for( msk_l= 0x80, msk_r= 0x01; msk_l; msk_l>>= 1, msk_r<<= 1)
00057         {
00058                 tmp|= (data& msk_l)? msk_r: 0x00;
00059         }
00060         return tmp;
00061 }

00066 void cvt_delay(int msec)
00067 {
00068 #ifdef LINUX
00069   usleep( msec* 1000); 
00070 #else
00071   Sleep( msec);
00072 #endif
00073 }

00079 #ifdef WIN32
00080 /*
00081         -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 
00083         DllMain
00084         Entry point della libreria (inizializzare qui i dati globali)
00085 
00086         -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 */
00088 BOOL WINAPI DllMain( HANDLE hModule, DWORD ul_reason_for_call, LPVOID lpReserved )
00089 {
00090     static int m_num_instances= 0;
00091 
00092         switch (ul_reason_for_call) {
00093         case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH:
00094                 {
00095                                         if( !m_num_instances)
00096                                         {
00097                                         }
00098 
00099                                         ++m_num_instances;
00100                 }
00101                 break;
00102         case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH:
00103                                 --m_num_instances;
00104                                 break;
00105         case DLL_THREAD_ATTACH:
00106         case DLL_THREAD_DETACH:
00107                 break;
00108         }
00109         return TRUE;
00110 }

00148 BOOL cvt_board_open( cvt_board_data* p_data, UINT16 base_address, long vme_handle, const cvt_reg_table *p_reg_table)
00149 {
00150         memset( p_data, 0, sizeof( cvt_board_data));
00151 
00152         // init fields
00153         p_data->m_base_address= base_address;
00154         p_data->m_vme_handle= vme_handle;
00155         p_data->m_p_reg_table= p_reg_table;
00156         
00157         return TRUE;
00158 }

00176 BOOL cvt_write( cvt_board_data* p_data, UINT16 address, const void* p_value, CVAddressModifier am, CVDataWidth data_size)
00177 {
00178         CVErrorCodes err_code;
00179         if( ( err_code= CAENVME_WriteCycle( p_data->m_vme_handle, (((UINT32)p_data->m_base_address)<< 16)| address, (void*)p_value, am, data_size))!= cvSuccess)
00180         {
00181                 TRACE( "CAENVME_WriteCycle: ");
00182                 TRACE( CAENVME_DecodeError( err_code));
00183                 TRACE( "\n");
00184                 return FALSE;
00185         }
00186         return TRUE;
00187 }
00188 
00190 // 
00192 BOOL cvt_read( cvt_board_data* p_data, UINT16 address, void* p_value, CVAddressModifier am, CVDataWidth data_size)
00193 {
00194         CVErrorCodes err_code;
00195         if( ( err_code= CAENVME_ReadCycle( p_data->m_vme_handle, (((UINT32)p_data->m_base_address)<< 16)| address, (void*)p_value, am, data_size))!= cvSuccess)
00196         {
00197                 TRACE( "CAENVME_ReadCycle: ");
00198                 TRACE( CAENVME_DecodeError( err_code));
00199                 TRACE( "\n");
00200                 return FALSE;
00201         }
00202         return TRUE;
00203 }

00206 // 
00208 BOOL cvt_set_bitmask( cvt_board_data* p_data, UINT16 address, void *p_value, CVAddressModifier am, CVDataWidth data_size)
00209 {
00210         switch( data_size) 
00211         {
00212         case cvD8:
00213                 {
00214                         UINT8 reg_value= 0;
00215                         if( !cvt_read( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00216                                 return FALSE;
00217                         reg_value|= *(UINT8*)p_value;
00218                         if( !cvt_write( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00219                                 return FALSE;
00220                 }
00221                 break;
00222         case cvD16:
00223         case cvD16_swapped:
00224                 {
00225                         UINT16 reg_value= 0;
00226                         if( !cvt_read( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00227                                 return FALSE;
00228                         reg_value|= *(UINT16*)p_value;
00229                         if( !cvt_write( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00230                                 return FALSE;
00231                 }
00232                 break;
00233         case cvD32:
00234         case cvD32_swapped:
00235                 {
00236                         UINT32 reg_value= 0;
00237                         if( !cvt_read( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00238                                 return FALSE;
00239                         reg_value|= *(UINT32*)p_value;
00240                         if( !cvt_write( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00241                                 return FALSE;
00242                 }
00243                 break;
00244         default:
00245                 return FALSE;
00246         }
00247 
00248         return TRUE;
00249 }
00250 
00252 // 
00254 BOOL cvt_clear_bitmask( cvt_board_data* p_data, UINT16 address, void* p_value, CVAddressModifier am, CVDataWidth data_size)
00255 {
00256         switch( data_size) 
00257         {
00258         case cvD8:
00259                 {
00260                         UINT8 reg_value= 0;
00261                         if( !cvt_read( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00262                                 return FALSE;
00263                         reg_value&= ~*(UINT8*)p_value;
00264                         if( !cvt_write( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00265                                 return FALSE;
00266                 }
00267                 break;
00268         case cvD16:
00269         case cvD16_swapped:
00270                 {
00271                         UINT16 reg_value= 0;
00272                         if( !cvt_read( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00273                                 return FALSE;
00274                         reg_value&= ~*(UINT16*)p_value;
00275                         if( !cvt_write( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00276                                 return FALSE;
00277                 }
00278                 break;
00279         case cvD32:
00280         case cvD32_swapped:
00281                 {
00282                         UINT32 reg_value= 0;
00283                         if( !cvt_read( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00284                                 return FALSE;
00285                         reg_value&= ~*(UINT32*)p_value;
00286                         if( !cvt_write( p_data, address, &reg_value, am, data_size))
00287                                 return FALSE;
00288                 }
00289                 break;
00290         default:
00291                 return FALSE;
00292         }
00293 
00294         return TRUE;
00295 }

00298 // 
00300 BOOL cvt_FIFO_BLT_read( cvt_board_data* p_data, UINT16 address, void* p_buffer, UINT32 buffer_size, UINT32 *p_read_bytes, CVAddressModifier am, CVDataWidth data_size, BOOL *p_is_berr)
00301 {
00302         // Avoid CAENVMELib Linux Driver limits to 16 MB
00303         const UINT32 MAX_BLT_SIZE= 8*1024*1024;
00304         int read_bytes= 0;
00305         UINT32 bytes_to_read= 0;
00306         CVErrorCodes err_code;
00307 
00308         *p_read_bytes= 0;
00309         while( *p_read_bytes< buffer_size)
00310         {
00311                 bytes_to_read= (( buffer_size- *p_read_bytes)>  MAX_BLT_SIZE)? MAX_BLT_SIZE: buffer_size- *p_read_bytes;
00312                 *p_is_berr= FALSE;
00313                 switch( err_code= CAENVME_FIFOBLTReadCycle( p_data->m_vme_handle, (((UINT32)p_data->m_base_address)<< 16)| address, (void*)((UINT8*)p_buffer+ *p_read_bytes), bytes_to_read, am, data_size, &read_bytes))
00314                 {
00315                 case cvBusError:
00316                         *p_is_berr= TRUE;
00317                 case cvSuccess:
00318                         break;
00319                 default:
00320                         TRACE( "CAENVME_FIFOBLTReadCycle: ");
00321                         TRACE( CAENVME_DecodeError( err_code));
00322                         TRACE( "\n");
00323                         return FALSE;
00324                 }
00325                 (*p_read_bytes)+= read_bytes;
00326                 if( bytes_to_read!= read_bytes)
00327                         break;
00328 
00329         }
00330         return TRUE;
00331 }

00339 }

00368 BOOL cvt_FIFO_BLT_read_reg( cvt_board_data* p_data, UINT16 reg_index, void* p_buffer, UINT32 buffer_size, UINT32 *p_read_bytes, BOOL *p_is_berr)
00369 {

00380 //
00382 BOOL cvt_set_MCST_CBLT( UINT8 address, cvt_board_data** board_array, UINT16 board_array_len)
00383 {
00384         MCST_CBLT_board_pos pos= MCST_CBLT_board_pos_last;
00385         while( board_array_len--)
00386         {
00387                 if( !board_array[ board_array_len]->set_MCST_CBLT)
00388                 {
00389                         TRACE1("cvt_set_MCST_CBLT: no set_MCST_CBLT method setted for board 0x%8p\n", board_array[ board_array_len]);
00390                         return FALSE;
00391                 }
00392                 if( !(board_array[ board_array_len]->set_MCST_CBLT)( board_array[ board_array_len], address, pos))
00393                 {
00394                         TRACE1("cvt_set_MCST_CBLT: set_MCST_CBLT method failure for board 0x%8p\n", board_array[ board_array_len]);
00395                         return FALSE;
00396                 }
00397                 pos= ( board_array_len- 1)? MCST_CBLT_board_pos_mid: MCST_CBLT_board_pos_first;
00398         }
00399         return TRUE;
00400 }
